definitions: 倒れる[たおれる] (v1, vi) to fall (over, down), to collapse, to take a fall, to topple,to be destroyed (in a collapse), to collapse, to cave in, to crumble, to give away,to be confined to bed (with an illness), to come down with, to break down (e.g. from overwork),to die, to be killed,to go bankrupt (of a company, bank, etc.), to fail, to collapse, to go under,to be defeated (in a game), to lose,to fall (of a government, dictator, etc.), to be overthrown
斃れる[たおれる] (v1, vi) to die, to be killed
english: Too bad. Those guys are over there.
japanese: 残念だったな。ヤツなら、そこで[たおれ]てるぜ

definitions: あっさり (adv, adv-to, vs) easily, readily, quickly, flatly (refuse),lightly (seasoned food, applied make-up, etc.), plainly, simply
english: Oh man…the Turks, being done in like that…  But, I won't let you through!
japanese: く～っ、あのタークスが[あっさり]やられるなんて……しかし、ここは通さんぞ！

definitions: お目出度い[おめでたい] (n) special, auspicious, happy,naive, innocent, good-natured, gullible, foolish
english: Oh great! What a buncha wizards you guys are! She's gonna take a 100 years!
japanese: ケッ！　[おめでたい]ヤツらだな！あの女に任せてた日にゃ１００年たっても終わんねぇぜ！

definitions: 這いずる[はいずる] (v5r, vi) to creep, to crawl
english: Humans only used to walk around on the ground but now they can fly!
japanese: 地ベタを[はいずり]まわってた人間が空を飛べるようになったんだぜ！

definitions: 育て上げる[そだてあげる] (v1, vt) to raise (to maturity), to bring up, to rear, to train, to educate

japanese: 科学は、人間が自らの手で生み出し、[育て上げ]た『力』だ。その科学が、この星を救うかもしれねえ

definitions: 元[もと] (n) origin, source,base, basis, foundation, root,cause,ingredient, material,(somebody's) side, (somebody's) location,original cost (or capital, principal, etc.),(plant) root, (tree) trunk,first section of a waka,counter for blades of grass, tree trunks, etc., and for falcons (in falconry),handle (chopsticks, brush, etc.), grip

素[そ] (adj-na, n, adj-no) plain, white silk,prime
english: I was able to earn my living, thanks to science. So to me, there's nothing greater!
japanese: 科学のおかげでメシをくってきたオレ様にとってはよこれほど[素]晴しいことはねぇぜ！

definitions: 晴れ[はれ] (adj-no, n) clear weather, fine weather,formal, ceremonial, public,cleared of suspicion
english: I was able to earn my living, thanks to science. So to me, there's nothing greater!
japanese: 科学のおかげでメシをくってきたオレ様にとってはよこれほど素[晴]しいことはねぇぜ！

definitions: 如何の斯うの[どうのこうの] (adv) this and that, one thing or another

japanese: いつまでも神羅がどうのこうの[こだわっ]てるんじゃねえ！

definitions: 航路[こうろ] (n) (air or sea) route, course, line, run

definitions: 放つ[はなつ] (v5t, vt) to fire (gun, arrow, questions, etc.), to shoot, to hit (e.g. baseball), to break wind,to set free, to release, to let loose,to emit (e.g. light), to give off (e.g. a scent),to send out (a person to carry out a duty),to set fire to
